targetLine.text: This can't be happening! You can't be here! It doesn't make sense that you are here! I refuse to even believe you are here!
targetLine.movie: Back to the Future Part III

contextBefore.text: But I came back from the future, remember? Last night you fainted... I brought ya home.

contextAfter.text: I am here, and it does make sense. I came back to 1955 with the you from 1985 to get a book back from Biff. So once we got the book back, you...that is, the you from 1985...were in the DeLorean when it got struck by lightning and you got sent back to 1885!
It's a very interesting story, Future Boy, but there's one little thing that doesn't make sense. If the me of the future is now in the past, how could you possibly know about it?

movieTitles.back-to-the-future-part-ii: Back to the Future Part II
movieTitles.back-to-the-future-part-iii: Back to the Future Part III
